data.event: The ancient village and parish of Weston was a forest clearing on the outskirts and was part of the Chartley Estate which was sold off in 1904.

event.title: is mentioned in the Domesday Book of 1086

data.event: Weston on Trent is mentioned in the Domesday Book of 1086.

event.title: was calculated at 0.1 geld units, with a Value to lord of the manor in 1086

data.event: The gross taxable value of the village was calculated at 0.1 geld units, with a Value to lord of the manor in 1086 of Â£0.1.
